entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
